author: Måns Dahlman
description: Beautifully balanced with lemon acidity cleansing and offsetting sweet orange with subtle herbal tequila.
name: Corpse Reviver No.4
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: RINSE chilled glass with absinthe and discard
STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into chilled, absinthe-rinsed glass
